issue.title: [Python] Allow Table.from_batches to use Iterator of ArrowRecordBatches
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2742](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2742). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently, pyarrow.Table.from_batches requires a list of record batches.  A simple change will allow this to accept an iterator, which could be useful.
